cancellationPolicies.label: Free Cancellation rates
cancellationPolicies.description: If you cancel your booking before 23:59 13th Nov 2025 (AEDT) your deposit will be refunded to your payment card. If you cancel after 23:59 13th Nov 2025 (AEDT) or in the event of a no-show, your deposit will not be refunded and the total of the first night's accommodation will be charged to your payment card, unless otherwise stated (see 'Things to Note' information). Please note that cancellations must be made directly within your booking in My Account.

cancellationPolicies.label: Non-refundable rates
cancellationPolicies.description: Your booking is non-refundable. If you choose to cancel your booking, or in the case of a no-show, you will still be charged the full cost of your booking.

dorms.name: Standard 6 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A single bunk in our largest room type. The 6-bed mixed dormitory offers a comfortable stay, with guests enjoying a bunk bed and locker. With contemporary decor and plenty of natural light, this dorm creates a welcoming relaxed atmosphere for everyone.

paymentProcedure.label: Deposit only
paymentProcedure.description:
Deposit only
Your deposit will be non-refundable unless the Standard Flexible Booking option is available and you select it. T&C apply.

paymentProcedure.label: Non-refundable
paymentProcedure.description:
Non-refundable
Your booking is non-refundable. The property will charge you the full amount at any time after your booking confirmation, even if you cancel or don’t show up.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Female Dorm
dorms.description: Female dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer female accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A single bunk in our 4-bed dorm exclusively for the girls. Guests enjoy a bunk bed and locker with hanging space, giving you space to unpack and secure your belongings. Contemporary decor natural light creates a relaxing atmosphere for all the girlypops.

dorms.name: Standard 4 Bed Mixed Dorm
dorms.description: Dormitory style and range in size from 2 beds upwards.  They offer mixed accommodation.
dorms.labelDescription: A single bunk in our freshly renovated 4-bed mixed dormitory. Features lockers with hanging space, giving you the convenience to unpack and keep your belongings secure. Contemporary decor and natural light creates a welcoming atmosphere for everyone.
